languages.text: "Наутро разразился скандал — кто-то посягнул на священную машину в резиденции дома! Меня быстро раскрыли, а добрый дядюшка нарек меня предателем рода и потребовал казни. Но в итоге мне сделали выговор, а казнили стражей, охранявших Рыцаря".

"There was a scandal the next morning. Someone had defaced a sacred machine inside our residence! I was soon discovered, and my uncle — kind as always — named me a traitor to the family and demanded my execution. In the end, however, I was merely reprimanded, and the guards in charge of watching the Knight were executed instead."
languages.original_text: "Наутро разразился скандал — кто-то посягнул на священную машину в резиденции дома! Меня быстро раскрыли, а добрый дядюшка нарек меня предателем рода и потребовал казни. Но в итоге мне сделали выговор, а казнили стражей, охранявших Рыцаря".

traits.locale_text: "The morning was a scandal — someone had defaced the sacred machine right in the house's residence! I was quickly exposed, and my kindly uncle named me a traitor to the family and demanded my execution. In the end, however, I was reprimanded, and the guards in charge of watching the Knight were executed instead."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

In the end, however, I was reprimanded, and the guards in charge of watching the Knight were executed instead."

traits.locale_text: "There was a scandal the next morning. Someone had defaced a sacred machine inside our residence! I was soon discovered, and my uncle — kind as always — named me a traitor to the family and demanded my execution. In the end, however, I was merely reprimanded, and the guards in charge of watching the Knight were executed instead."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Un scandale a éclaté le lendemain matin. Quelqu'un avait endommagé une machine sacrée dans notre résidence ! On a rapidement découvert que j'étais le coupable et mon oncle, bien connu pour sa grande bonté, a exigé mon exécution en m'accusant de trahison contre notre famille. Au bout du compte, cependant, on m'a simplement réprimandé et ce sont les gardes chargés de surveiller le Chevalier qui ont été exécutés à ma place. »
languages.original_text: "There was a scandal the next morning. Someone had defaced a sacred machine inside our residence! I was soon discovered, and my uncle — kind as always — named me a traitor to the family and demanded my execution. In the end, however, I was merely reprimanded, and the guards in charge of watching the Knight were executed instead."

traits.locale_text: « Un scandale a éclaté le lendemain matin. Quelqu'un avait endommagé une machine sacrée dans notre résidence ! On a rapidement découvert que j'étais le coupable et mon oncle, bien connu pour sa grande bonté, a exigé mon exécution en m'accusant de trahison contre notre famille. Au bout du compte, cependant, on m'a simplement réprimandé et ce sont les gardes chargés de surveiller le Chevalier qui ont été exécutés à ma place. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «A la mañana siguiente, se produjo un escándalo. ¡Alguien había vandalizado una máquina sagrada en nuestra residencia! Pronto me descubrieron y mi tío, tan amable como de costumbre, me declaró traidor a la familia y exigió mi ejecución. Sin embargo, al final solo me llevé una reprimenda y fueron los guardias encargados de vigilar al Caballero los que acabaron ejecutados».
languages.original_text: "There was a scandal the next morning. Someone had defaced a sacred machine inside our residence! I was soon discovered, and my uncle — kind as always — named me a traitor to the family and demanded my execution. In the end, however, I was merely reprimanded, and the guards in charge of watching the Knight were executed instead."

traits.locale_text: «A la mañana siguiente, se produjo un escándalo. ¡Alguien había vandalizado una máquina sagrada en nuestra residencia! Pronto me descubrieron y mi tío, tan amable como de costumbre, me declaró traidor a la familia y exigió mi ejecución. Sin embargo, al final solo me llevé una reprimenda y fueron los guardias encargados de vigilar al Caballero los que acabaron ejecutados».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “到了第二天早上，这件事情变成了众人皆知的丑闻——有人破坏了家族的神圣机械！没过多久，他们就把我揪出来了，我那个心地善良的叔叔说我是家族的叛徒，要求把我处死。可到了最后，我仅仅是被训斥了一顿，而那个负责看守帝国骑士的卫兵却被处决了。”
languages.original_text: "There was a scandal the next morning. Someone had defaced a sacred machine inside our residence! I was soon discovered, and my uncle — kind as always — named me a traitor to the family and demanded my execution. In the end, however, I was merely reprimanded, and the guards in charge of watching the Knight were executed instead."

traits.locale_text: “到了第二天早上，这件事情变成了众人皆知的丑闻——有人破坏了家族的神圣机械！没过多久，他们就把我揪出来了，我那个心地善良的叔叔说我是家族的叛徒，要求把我处死。可到了最后，我仅仅是被训斥了一顿，而那个负责看守帝国骑士的卫兵却被处决了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「翌朝、スキャンダルがあった。誰かが私たちの家の中にある神聖な機械を壊したのです！私はすぐに発見され、叔父はいつものように親切にせっしてくれた。私を一族の裏切り者と決めつけ、処刑を要求しました。しかし結局、私は叱責されただけで、代わりにナイトの監視を担当していた衛兵が処刑されました」
languages.original_text: "There was a scandal the next morning. Someone had defaced a sacred machine inside our residence! I was soon discovered, and my uncle — kind as always — named me a traitor to the family and demanded my execution. In the end, however, I was merely reprimanded, and the guards in charge of watching the Knight were executed instead."

traits.locale_text: 「翌朝、スキャンダルがあった。誰かが私たちの家の中にある神聖な機械を壊したのです！私はすぐに発見され、叔父はいつものように親切にせっしてくれた。私を一族の裏切り者と決めつけ、処刑を要求しました。しかし結局、私は叱責されただけで、代わりにナイトの監視を担当していた衛兵が処刑されました」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Am nächsten Morgen gab es einen Skandal. Jemand hatte eine heilige Maschine in unserem Wohnhaus geschändet! Ich war schnell als der Täter identifiziert, und mein Onkel — gütig wie eh und je — nannte mich einen Verräter an der Familie und forderte meine Hinrichtung. Letztlich jedoch wurde ich lediglich getadelt und es wurden stattdessen die Wachen hingerichtet, die für den Schutz des Ritters zuständig gewesen waren."
languages.original_text: "There was a scandal the next morning. Someone had defaced a sacred machine inside our residence! I was soon discovered, and my uncle — kind as always — named me a traitor to the family and demanded my execution. In the end, however, I was merely reprimanded, and the guards in charge of watching the Knight were executed instead."

traits.locale_text: "Am nächsten Morgen gab es einen Skandal. Jemand hatte eine heilige Maschine in unserem Wohnhaus geschändet! Ich war schnell als der Täter identifiziert, und mein Onkel — gütig wie eh und je — nannte mich einen Verräter an der Familie und forderte meine Hinrichtung. Letztlich jedoch wurde ich lediglich getadelt und es wurden stattdessen die Wachen hingerichtet, die für den Schutz des Ritters zuständig gewesen waren."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Sonraki sabah bir skandal patlak verdi. Birileri hanemizin içinde kutsal bir makineyi tahrif etmişti! Kısa süre içinde bulundum ve amcam, her zamanki nezaketiyle beni ailem için bir hain ilan edip idamımı istedi. Ancak nihayetinde yalnızca azarlandım ve benim yerime Şövalye'yi korumakla görevli muhafızlar idam edildi."
languages.original_text: "There was a scandal the next morning. Someone had defaced a sacred machine inside our residence! I was soon discovered, and my uncle — kind as always — named me a traitor to the family and demanded my execution. In the end, however, I was merely reprimanded, and the guards in charge of watching the Knight were executed instead."
